case.name: Stripping boots
case.description: Mika calls Nadeshiko to help her remove her boots.

case.name: Stripping leotard
case.description: Mika calls Nadeshiko to help her remove her leotard.

case.name: Stripping thong
case.description: Mika calls Nadeshiko to help her remove her thong

case.name: Match begins
case.description: Mika begins her "masturbation" sequence, wrestling Nadeshiko throughout the whole stage.

case.name: Cammy gets attacked
case.description: When playing with Cammy, Mika will ask for her help when she is about to remove her thong. She'll then attack her with a Shooting Peach as she removes her thong.

case.name: Cammy suffocating
case.description: After her attack, Mika sits on top of a suffocating Cammy while Nadeshiko tries to help her.

case.name: Mika's apology
case.description: Mika apologizes to Cammy after almost killing her.

case.name: Mask falls off
case.description: Mika's mask falls off when she's naked.

case.name: Mika embarrassed
case.description: Mika gets embarrassed after her mask falls off.

case.name: Putting mask back on
case.description: Mika puts her mask back on while explaining her behaviour.
